name: Music_3142.wav
keywords: ['slow song', 'pop song', 'romantic mood', 'male voice', 'slow tempo', 'tuba', 'trumpets', 'simple percussion']
caption: This pop song features a male voice singing the main melody. This is accompanied by percussion playing a simple beat. The hi-hat is played in eighth notes. The bass is played on a tuba. The root notes of the chords are played. Trumpets play a staccato note at every alternate beat. A brass instrument plays a fill after the first two bars. The mood of this song is romantic. This song can be played in a romantic movie.
